response.overview: Fresh graduate Lu Xiaofan steps into the cutthroat world of celebrity management as an assistant agent at IFS First Talent Agency, assigned to handle rising star Tang Zhe—a narcissistic diva who sabotages Xiaofan at every turn. When Tang's scheming costs Xiaofan his job, the humiliated underdog plots poetic revenge.  Enrolling in IFS's viral "Web Star" talent competition, Xiaofan unexpectedly catches the eye of agency president Gu Han. Overnight, he's reborn as the company's newest idol, with Gu Han diverting prime opportunities—including a coveted lead film role—from Tang Zhe to Xiaofan. Now, the hunter becomes the prey in this high-stakes game of industry warfare.
response.title: Why Male World
